stimulusHtml: An electric field is produced by the very long, uniformly charged rod drawn above. If the strength of the electric field is E1 at a distance r1 from the axis of the rod, at what distance from the axis is the field strength  E 1 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C02@ ?
choicesHtml: r 1 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C2F@

r 1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C2D@
